attributes.action: Install speed cameras outside schools located on main roads across NI.
attributes.additional_details: It should be the priority of any parliament to ensure the safety and prosperity of the next generations. A few speed cameras will not change the world but it will certainly reassure parents across this country that their children are arriving at school safely.
attributes.background:
I would like the speed cameras installed outside main road situated schools to keep our children safe. 
Carrickfergus Model PS has an ineffective traffic light system. Multiple incidents of running lights at ridiculous speeds endangering our children and other road users.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Executive and Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for. 

If you want to raise this issue you could contact your MLA, or raise it with the Northern Ireland Executive.

You can find contact details for your MLAs here: http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/your-mlas/

You can find contact details for the departments of the Northern Ireland Executive here: https://www.nidirect.gov.uk/contacts/government-departments-in-northern-ireland
